00046 void LogCollector::runLoop() {
00047 
00048         std::string outStr = m_queue.pop();
00049 
00050         if(outStr.length() == 1 && outStr[0] == ' '){
00051                 usleep(100);
00052                 return;
00053         }
00054 
00055         if (m_out & STDOUT)
00056                 std::cout << outStr << std::endl;
00057 
00058         if (m_out & FILE) {
00059                 m_fileStream << outStr << std::endl;
00060         }
00061 
00062         if (m_out & NETWORK)
00063                 std::cout << "send to m.logger: " << outStr;
00064 
00065 }
00066 
00067 int32_t LogCollector::init(XmlConfigPtr cfg) {
00068 
00069 
00070         std::string onStdOut_str = cfg->get("stdout");
00071         if ((onStdOut_str.find("true") != std::string::npos)) {
00072                 m_out |= LogCollector::STDOUT;
00073         }
00074 
00075         //get path
00076         m_filePath = cfg->get("path");
00077         if (m_filePath.length()) {
00078                 m_fileStream.open(m_filePath.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::app);
00079                 if (m_fileStream.fail()) {
00080                         std::cerr << "can't open file " << m_filePath;
00081                         return -1;
00082                 }
00083                 m_out |= LogCollector::FILE;
00084         }
00085 
00086         //get level
00087         std::string logLevel = cfg->get("level");
00088         if (!logLevel.compare("INFO")) {
00089                 m_level = INFO;
00090         } else if (!logLevel.compare("WARNING")) {
00091                 m_level = WARNING;
00092         } else if (!logLevel.compare("ERROR")) {
00093                 m_level = ERROR;
00094         } else if (!logLevel.compare("CRITICAL")) {
00095                 m_level = CRITICAL;
00096         } else if (!logLevel.compare("DEBUG")) {
00097                 m_level = DEBUG;
00098         } else {
00099                 m_level = TRACE;
00100         }
00101 
00102         std::string def = cfg->get("default");
00103         if (!def.compare("true")) {
00104                 m_default = true;
00105         }
00106 
00107         ConfigList classNames = cfg->getConfigs(std::string("class"));
00108         for (size_t m = 0; m < classNames.size(); m++) {
00109                 std::string className = classNames[m]->get("name");
00110                 m_classNames.push_back(className);
00111         }
00112 
00113         return 0;
00114 }

00116 }
